name: Belgrade 2100
description:
It's year 2100. Plants have taken over the planet. What now?

Go in your time machine to kill the plants and to collect samples. Exchange the samples for skills points and upgrade your character. 

Use WASD keys to move and SPACE key to attack. Q key is used for a special attack and T key is used to travel back in time.

Team project, made for 30-hour OpenIT game jam. October, 2022.

IMPORTANT: The game's resolution is broken on smaller screens. If that is the case for you, play this game on the following LINK.
